item.title: Italian Helmer Enrico Maria Artale Honors Jacques Audiard’s Legacy in ‘A Prophet’: ‘Many French Directors Refused to Do the Series’
item.description: Italian director Enrico Maria Artale wasn’t scared of referencing Jacques Audiard’s 2009 Oscar-nominated drama in his eight-episode series “A Prophet,” now premiering in Venice. But others were.

item.title: Guy Pearce in Talks to Star as Rupert Murdoch in Danny Boyle’s ‘Ink’
item.description: Jack O’Connell is also eyeing a starring role in the film focusing on the media mogul.
